thread.section_title: Arts and Entertainment coverage for all ages and interests - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: An immersive classical dance party
thread.title_full: An immersive classical dance party - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joshua Kosman
title: An immersive classical dance party
text:
Photo: Josh Tulman Christian Baldini conducts an unpredictable classical playlist. Christian Baldini conducts an unpredictable classical playlist.
Mercury Soul, the swirling, genre-busting musical extravaganza that was a hit here in 2008, returns to San Francisco with an unpredictable blend of live classical performers, DJs and electronic dance music. The classical playlist, conducted by Christian Baldini, includes music of Stravinsky, Bach, Poulenc, Mason Bates and Gabriela Lena Frank, performed by the Elevate Ensemble, Del Sol Quartet and more.
